title: Drawing, "Feather Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: Densely arranged swirling feather design in red and pale pink on black background.

Drawing, "Feather Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-53.
